data.title: Chapter House List
data.text:
University-owned Greek Village Housing

These fraternities and sororities lease facilities from the University and operate them for the benefit of their members.

Alpha Gamma Rho – 1402 Varsity Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Pi Kappa Phi – 3501 Avent Ferry Road, Raleigh, NC 27606

Delta Sigma Phi – 2511 Fraternity Court, Raleigh, NC 27606

Kappa Kappa Gamma – 2601 Fraternity Court, Raleigh, NC 27606

Pi Beta Phi – 2501 Fraternity Court, Raleigh, NC 27606

Chapter Commons – (3 organization spaces)

Alpha Xi Delta – 516-A Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Pi Kappa Alpha – 516-C Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phi Kappa Tau – 516-B Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Greek Village Townhomes – (6 organization spaces)

Alpha Omega Epsilon – 512-E Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Alpha Tau Omega – 512-D Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phi Beta Sigma – 512-C Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phi Gamma Delta – 512-B Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Sigma Alpha Mu – 512-F Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Tau Kappa Epsilon – 512-A Dan Allen Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Greek Village Apartments – (37 units plus 2 organization spaces)

Kappa Alpha Psi – 2330 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Lambda Theta Phi – 2330 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Privately-owned Greek Village Houses

These fraternities and sororities own and operate their houses in Greek Village with support from the University. New privately-owned houses will continue to be built over the next 10 years.

Phase 1

Delta Gamma [tour] – 2300 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Kappa Delta [tour] – 2304 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Sigma Phi Epsilon – 2308 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Sigma Nu [tour] – 2312 Greek Village Drive, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phase 2

Delta Zeta [tour] – 2601 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Lambda Chi Alpha – 2605 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phase 3

Kappa Alpha Theta [tour] – 2600 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Zeta Tau Alpha [tour]- 2604 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Sigma Kappa [tour] – 2608 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Alpha Delta Pi [tour] – 2612 Stewardship Park, Raleigh, NC 27606

Phase 4

5 new lots for Chapter House construction

Phi Kappa Tau – 2212 Greek Village Drive (future)

Pi Beta Phi – 2208 Greek Village Drive (future)

Pi Kappa Phi – 2204 Greek Village Drive (future)

Kappa Kappa Gamma – 2200 Greek Village Drive (future)

Sigma Alpha Mu – 2609 Stewardship Park (Fall 2027)

Off-Campus Chapter Houses

These fraternities and sororities live in off-campus houses either owned by their organization or leased from a private realtor. FSL only recognizes those premises appropriately zoned by the City of Raleigh for chapter/organization use (OX-3, RX-3, or OX-12):
